title: CIDR Summarization Tool
description: Convert mixed IP addresses, CIDR blocks, and ranges into optimized CIDR prefixes with separate IPv4/IPv6 results.

exactMerge.label: Exact Merge
exactMerge.description: Merge overlapping ranges exactly without additional aggregation

minimalCover.label: Minimal Cover
minimalCover.description: Find the smallest set of CIDR blocks that covers all inputs

input.title: Input Data
input.label: Enter IP addresses, CIDR blocks, or ranges (one per line)

results.title: Summarization Results
results.copyAllTooltip: Copy all IPv4 and IPv6 results to clipboard
results.ipv4Tooltip: Copy all IPv4 CIDR blocks to clipboard
results.ipv6Tooltip: Copy all IPv6 CIDR blocks to clipboard
results.copyCIDRTooltip: Copy this CIDR block to clipboard

originalIPv4Items.label: Original IPv4 Items
originalIPv4Items.tooltip: Number of individual IPv4 items in the original input

summarizedIPv4Blocks.label: Summarized IPv4 Blocks
summarizedIPv4Blocks.tooltip: Number of CIDR blocks after IPv4 summarization

originalIPv6Items.label: Original IPv6 Items
originalIPv6Items.tooltip: Number of individual IPv6 items in the original input

summarizedIPv6Blocks.label: Summarized IPv6 Blocks
summarizedIPv6Blocks.tooltip: Number of CIDR blocks after IPv6 summarization

totalAddressesCovered.label: Total Addresses Covered
totalAddressesCovered.tooltip: Total number of individual IP addresses covered by all summarized blocks
